name: Half-Day Best Of Everything Tour
description: This is for those who don’t have time for the full day.  Join us for the morning portion of the tour and finish after lunch.  You will have the opportunity to have clothing tailor made, purchase souvenirs, accessories like cufflinks, ties, belts, scarves and pashminas along with some great gifts.  Enjoy the spectacular Chinese porcelain and discover how the Chinese make silk.  Join us for a fabulous lunch and we will organize a taxi to take you from there back to your hotel – or, opt to stay on and do the full day if you think you will be missing out!
